name: TV Magic
description:
Play a gamer playing a game.

TV Magic is a puzzle platformer where throwing things at your TV is an acceptable way to play. 

Controls

  • E - Look Around/ Play Console
  • A/D - Move Left and Right
  • Space - Jump (hold to jump higher)
  • Mouse - To Pickup/Use Objects

Made in 48h for Nordic Game Jam Online 2020!

Team

  • Amar, Game Designer/Programmer
  • Enrico, 3D Artist
  • Gabrielle, 2D Artist
  • Michael, Composer
